posts.post_content: 1895 Mayo Cut Plug N300---I have the following 25 Mayo's for sale---SGC Authentic Cartwright $175===SGC 10 Haddock(no Team) $200===SGc 10 Tucker $225===SGC 10 Griffin $190===SGC 20 Hallman $290===SGC 20 Ryan $190===SGC 20 Daly $220===SGC 20 Foutz $190===SGC 20 Long $210===SGC Joyce $210===SGC 30 Ganzel $220===SGC 30 Smith $300===SGC 30 Lowe $300===SGC 30 Cross $310===SGC 30 Glasscock(Louisville) $400===SGC 30 Corcoran $300===SGC 30 Lovett $310===SGC 40 Shindle $525===SGC 40 Kinslow(Pitt) $500===SGC 50 Nash $550===SGC 50 Bannon $425===SGC Authentic Duffy $530===SGC Authentic Hamilton $550===SGC 10 McCarthy $550===SGC 40 Robinson $1400--I will sell at these prices or will consider offers-Scans are available--email me with any questions---thanks, Don
